blocks.content:
**Languages**: [C++](https://github.com/benhurley/hash-table-project "Hash Table Project"), Javascript (ES6), Java, Python, NodeJS, [Perl](https://github.com/benhurley/fix-corrupted-emails "Broken Email Decoder"), HTML, CSS

**Skills:** [AWS](https://www.certmetrics.com/amazon/public/badge.aspx?i=1&t=c&d=2019-08-16&ci=AWS00529386 "Solutions Architect Cert"), Serverless, DevOps ([Git](https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamin-hurley/detail/assessments/Git/report/ "Linkedin Git Exam Results"), Jenkins, CircleCI, Jest, Cypress, etc.), Alexa Skills Kit (ASK), RESTful API’s, [Shell Scripting](https://github.com/benhurley/aws-dev-ops-automation "AWS DevOps Scripts"), SQL, SSIS Packages

Frameworks: [ReactJS / Redux](https://github.com/benhurley/react-hooks "React Hooks"), Gatsby, Serverless Framework, Sklearn
